name: Queen of the Hive
description:
Queen of the Hive

Be your own boss and grow your hive, from just one queen bee to an army of honey making machines. There's no rush though, just enjoy the scenery and grow at your own pace.

Controls:

Use your mouse to guide your queen bee

"Left Click" to deposit pollen into honeycombs

"B" to open the shop

"Escape" to quit the game

This game was made for the VimJam 2: Boss Game Jam in less than 1 week. Thank you for playing!
